entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
